price: Man prays for evil as he prays for good, for man is ever hasty[10].
arabic: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا
footnotes: [10] i.e., becomes impatient and acts without forethought.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayadʿu al-insānu bil-shari duʿāahu bil-khayri wakāna al-insānu ʿajūlan
